name: Quick Break - break platforms
description:
Quick Break - is an arcade game in which you have to get to the very finish line by breaking platforms along the way.

Sounds simple enough?! As if not so!

Breaking colorful platforms you get points, but the fall of the figure prevents the bizarre shape of the locations, furnished with black platforms that sometimes move!

If you encounter them, the figure will split into pieces, and you will have to start all over again!

But if you try hard, the figure will be able to get around even these obstacles!

Each player can choose their own style: fly at full speed to victory or slow down and wait for the right moment.

And the opportunity to get a lot of skins for your figurine will brighten up your game!

Quick Break is:

- Mind-blowing speed

- Destructible locations

- Beautiful skins

- Addictive gameplay

- Juicy and bright colors

- Simple and clear

- Free time killer
